timeline.bodyText:
From https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Histogram#Mathematical_definition, there are two types of histogram bin:

Cumulative: prometheus, otel.
Ordinary: agent meter.

Let's provide two functions to set it, and defaults to cumulative.
timeline.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: What I mean is histogramDecrease is not clear and very confusing to ppl. Let's opt for the notions that is well-known for ppl.
replies.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: Created HistogramType enum to adapt this.
replies.author: mrproliu

timeline.bodyText:
My preference is to add a new factory to build SampleFamily with those two settings. If we define functions in SampleFamily, that means end-users could access them, that will cause some potential issues.
and they represent the different behaviors of the eco-system, I don't find any reason to access them in a MAL expression.
timeline.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: Have created SampleFactoryBuilder to help create SampleFactory with these two settings.
replies.author: mrproliu

timeline.message: Using Builder mode to create SampleFamily
